author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three houses in and around Saravanampatty were burgled early on Sunday and Monday.

R. Sumesh (35) of LGP Nagar at Krishnapuram in Saravanampatty lost jewellery weighing about 72 gm. S. Sathyamoorthy (59) lost jewellery weighing about 40 gm.

M. Sivakumar (45), at Arasumara Thottam in Chinnametupalayam, lost about 48 gm of jewellery.
title: Three houses burgled
